com.netflix.genie.agent.execution.statemachine

Class ExecutionContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.agent.execution.statemachine.ExecutionContext

  • public class ExecutionContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores runtime information that is passed from one state to the next. Example, exceptions encountered during execution, whether a job process was launched or not, the local job directory, if one was created, etc.
    Since:
    4.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ExecutionContext.TransitionExceptionRecord
      Data object that contains an exception and the state in which it was encountered.

      Get the list of execution exception encountered (fatal and non-fatal).
      boolean isExecutionAborted()
      Convenience method to determine whether the execution is aborted (as a result of a fatal error in a critical state or due to a kill request).
      void recordTransitionException(States state, java.lang.Exception recordedException)
      Record an execution exception, even if it is retryable.
